resources.string: The app collects a list of words from DR.dk and picks one at random for the player to guess.
To guess a letter, type in a single lower case letter in the text field and click confirm. A list of letters you have used is shown and the hidden word will reveal itself as you guess letters.
You win a round if you guess the words before the convict is fully drawn. The app tracks a users winning streak. The 10 users with the highest all time streak are visible in the highscore list.
You failed to guess the word!! Sadly the convict now hangs as a testement to your failure
